verses.verse: לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תִשָּׂ֖א <WH5375> Thou shalt not raise שֵׁ֣מַע <WH8088> report שָׁ֑וְא <WH7723> a false אַל־ <WH408> not תָּ֤שֶׁת <WH7896> put יָֽדְךָ֙ <WH3027> not thine hand עִם־ <WH5973> with רָשָׁ֔ע <WH7563> with the wicked לִהְיֹ֖ת <WH1961> become עֵ֥ד <WH5707> witness חָמָֽס׃ <WH2555> to be an unrighteous ס

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become אַחֲרֵֽי־ <WH310> Thou shalt not follow רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> a multitude לְרָעֹ֑ת <WH7451> to [do] evil וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor תַעֲנֶ֣ה <WH6030> neither shalt thou speak עַל־ <WH5921> in רִ֗ב <WH7379> in a cause לִנְטֹ֛ת <WH5186> to decline אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> many לְהַטֹּֽת׃ <WH5186> to wrest
וְדָ֕ל <WH1800> a poor לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תֶהְדַּ֖ר <WH1921> Neither shalt thou countenance בְּרִיבֽוֹ׃ <WH7379> man in his cause ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> If תִפְגַּ֞ע <WH6293> If thou meet שׁ֧וֹר <WH7794> ox אֹֽיִבְךָ֛ <WH341> thine enemy's א֥וֹ <WH176> or חֲמֹר֖וֹ <WH2543> or his ass תֹּעֶ֑ה <WH8582> going astray הָשֵׁ֥ב <WH7725> thou shalt surely תְּשִׁיבֶ֖נּוּ <WH7725> to him again לֽוֹ׃ ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If תִרְאֶ֞ה <WH7200> If thou see חֲמ֣וֹר <WH2543> the ass שֹׂנַאֲךָ֗ <WH8130> of him that hateth רֹבֵץ֙ <WH7257> thee lying תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under מַשָּׂא֔וֹ <WH4853> under his burden וְחָדַלְתָּ֖ <WH2308> and wouldest forbear מֵעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> to help ל֑וֹ עָזֹ֥ב <WH5800> him thou shalt surely תַּעֲזֹ֖ב <WH5800> help עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with ס
לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תַטֶּ֛ה <WH5186> Thou shalt not wrest מִשְׁפַּ֥ט <WH4941> the judgment אֶבְיֹנְךָ֖ <WH34> of thy poor בְּרִיבֽוֹ׃ <WH7379> in his cause

מִדְּבַר־ <WH1697> matter שֶׁ֖קֶר <WH8267> from a false תִּרְחָ֑ק <WH7368> Keep thee far וְנָקִ֤י <WH5355> and the innocent וְצַדִּיק֙ <WH6662> and righteous אַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּהֲרֹ֔ג <WH2026> slay כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> I will not אַצְדִּ֖יק <WH6663> thou not for I will not justify רָשָֽׁע׃ <WH7563> the wicked

וְשֹׁ֖חַד <WH7810> no gift לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תִקָּ֑ח <WH3947> And thou shalt take כִּ֤י <WH3588> for הַשֹּׁ֙חַד֙ <WH7810> for the gift יְעַוֵּ֣ר <WH5786> blindeth פִּקְחִ֔ים <WH6493> the wise וִֽיסַלֵּ֖ף <WH5557> and perverteth דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> the words צַדִּיקִֽים׃ <WH6662> of the righteous

וְגֵ֖ר <WH1616> a stranger לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תִלְחָ֑ץ <WH3905> Also thou shalt not oppress וְאַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> you יְדַעְתֶּם֙ <WH3045> for ye know אֶת־ <WH853> נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> the heart הַגֵּ֔ר <WH1616> of a stranger כִּֽי־ <WH3588> seeing גֵרִ֥ים <WH1616> ye were strangers הֱיִיתֶ֖ם <WH1961> become בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> And six שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years תִּזְרַ֣ע <WH2232> thou shalt sow אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצֶ֑ךָ <WH776> thy land וְאָסַפְתָּ֖ <WH622> and shalt gather אֶת־ <WH853> תְּבוּאָתָֽהּ׃ <WH8393> in the fruits

וְהַשְּׁבִיעִ֞ת <WH7637> But the seventh תִּשְׁמְטֶ֣נָּה <WH8058> [year] thou shalt let it rest וּנְטַשְׁתָּ֗הּ <WH5203> and lie וְאָֽכְלוּ֙ <WH398> may eat אֶבְיֹנֵ֣י <WH34> still that the poor עַמֶּ֔ךָ <WH5971> of thy people וְיִתְרָ֕ם <WH3499> and what they leave תֹּאכַ֖ל <WH398> shall eat חַיַּ֣ת <WH2416> the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> of the field כֵּֽן־ <WH3651> the same תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> In like manner thou shalt deal לְכַרְמְךָ֖ <WH3754> with thy vineyard לְזֵיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH2132> [and] with thy oliveyard

שֵׁ֤שֶׁת <WH8337> Six יָמִים֙ <WH3117> days תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> thou shalt do מַעֲשֶׂ֔יךָ <WH4639> thy work וּבַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <WH7637> and on the seventh תִּשְׁבֹּ֑ת <WH7673> thou shalt rest לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> so יָנ֗וּחַ <WH5117> may rest שֽׁוֹרְךָ֙ <WH7794> that thine ox וַחֲמֹרֶ֔ךָ <WH2543> and thine ass וְיִנָּפֵ֥שׁ <WH5314> may be refreshed בֶּן־ <WH1121> and the son אֲמָתְךָ֖ <WH519> of thy handmaid וְהַגֵּֽר׃ <WH1616> and the stranger

וּבְכֹ֛ל <WH3605> everything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אָמַ֥רְתִּי <WH559> And in all [things] that I have said אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH413> to you תִּשָּׁמֵ֑רוּ <WH8104> unto you be circumspect וְשֵׁ֨ם <WH8034> of the name אֱלֹהִ֤ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִים֙ <WH312> of other לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תַזְכִּ֔ירוּ <WH2142> and make no mention לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יִשָּׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> neither let it be heard עַל־ <WH5921> out פִּֽיךָ׃ <WH6310> of thy mouth
שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> Three רְגָלִ֔ים <WH7272> times תָּחֹ֥ג <WH2287> thou shalt keep a feast לִ֖י בַּשָּׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> unto me in the year

אֶת־ <WH853> חַ֣ג <WH2282> the feast הַמַּצּוֹת֮ <WH4682> of unleavened bread תִּשְׁמֹר֒ <WH8104> Thou shalt keep שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> seven יָמִים֩ <WH3117> days תֹּאכַ֨ל <WH398> (thou shalt eat מַצּ֜וֹת <WH4682> unleavened bread כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> I צִוִּיתִ֗ךָ <WH6680> as I commanded לְמוֹעֵד֙ <WH4150> thee in the time appointed חֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> of the month הָֽאָבִ֔יב <WH24> Abib כִּי־ <WH3588> for ב֖וֹ יָצָ֣אתָ <WH3318> for in it thou camest out מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> from Egypt וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and none יֵרָא֥וּ <WH7200> and none shall appear פָנַ֖י <WH6440> before רֵיקָֽם׃ <WH7387> empty-handed

וְחַ֤ג <WH2282> And the feast הַקָּצִיר֙ <WH7105> of harvest בִּכּוּרֵ֣י <WH1061> the firstfruits מַעֲשֶׂ֔יךָ <WH4639> of thy labours אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what תִּזְרַ֖ע <WH2232> which thou hast sown בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> in the field וְחַ֤ג <WH2282> and the feast הָֽאָסִף֙ <WH614> of ingathering בְּצֵ֣את <WH3318> [which is] in the end הַשָּׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> of the year בְּאָסְפְּךָ֥ <WH622> when thou hast gathered אֶֽת־ <WH853> מַעֲשֶׂ֖יךָ <WH4639> in thy labours מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> out of the field

שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> Three פְּעָמִ֖ים <WH6471> times בַּשָּׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> in the year יֵרָאֶה֙ <WH7200> shall appear כָּל־ <WH3605> all זְכ֣וּרְךָ֔ <WH2138> all thy males אֶל־ <WH413> about פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> before הָאָדֹ֥ן ׀ <WH136> the Lord יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> GOD

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תִזְבַּ֥ח <WH2076> Thou shalt not offer עַל־ <WH5921> with חָמֵ֖ץ <WH2557> with leavened bread דַּם־ <WH1818> the blood זִבְחִ֑י <WH2077> of my sacrifice וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יָלִ֥ין <WH3885> remain חֵֽלֶב־ <WH2459> neither shall the fat חַגִּ֖י <WH2282> of my sacrifice עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> until the morning

רֵאשִׁ֗ית <WH7225> The first בִּכּוּרֵי֙ <WH1061> of the firstfruits אַדְמָ֣תְךָ֔ <WH127> of thy land תָּבִ֕יא <WH935> thou shalt bring בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God לֹֽא־ <WH3808> are not תְבַשֵּׁ֥ל <WH1310> Thou shalt not seethe גְּדִ֖י <WH1423> a kid בַּחֲלֵ֥ב <WH2461> milk אִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH517> in his mother's ס

הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אָנֹכִ֜י <WH595> I שֹׁלֵ֤חַ <WH7971> Behold I send מַלְאָךְ֙ <WH4397> an Angel לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before לִשְׁמָרְךָ֖ <WH8104> thee to keep בַּדָּ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> thee in the way וְלַהֲבִ֣יאֲךָ֔ <WH935> and to bring אֶל־ <WH413> into הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> thee into the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הֲכִנֹֽתִי׃ <WH3559> which I have prepared

הִשָּׁ֧מֶר <WH8104> Beware מִפָּנָ֛יו <WH6440> of וּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> him and obey בְּקֹל֖וֹ <WH6963> his voice אַל־ <WH408> nay תַּמֵּ֣ר <WH4843> provoke בּ֑וֹ כִּ֣י <WH3588> since לֹ֤א <WH3808> he will not יִשָּׂא֙ <WH5375> him not for he will not pardon לְפִשְׁעֲכֶ֔ם <WH6588> your transgressions כִּ֥י <WH3588> since שְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> for my name בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH7130> [is] in him

כִּ֣י <WH3588> But אִם־ <WH518> if שָׁמֹ֤עַ <WH8085> But if thou shalt indeed תִּשְׁמַע֙ <WH8085> obey בְּקֹל֔וֹ <WH6963> his voice וְעָשִׂ֕יתָ <WH6213> and do כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> i אֲדַבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> all that I speak וְאָֽיַבְתִּי֙ <WH341> unto thine enemies אֶת־ <WH853> אֹ֣יְבֶ֔יךָ <WH340> then I will be an enemy וְצַרְתִּ֖י <WH6696> unto thine adversaries אֶת־ <WH853> צֹרְרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6887> and an adversary

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יֵלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> will go מַלְאָכִי֮ <WH4397> For mine Angel לְפָנֶיךָ֒ <WH6440> before וֶהֱבִֽיאֲךָ֗ <WH935> thee and bring אֶל־ <WH413> to הָֽאֱמֹרִי֙ <WH567> thee in unto the Amorites וְהַ֣חִתִּ֔י <WH2850> and the Hittites וְהַפְּרִזִּי֙ <WH6522> and the Perizzites וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <WH3669> and the Canaanites הַחִוִּ֖י <WH2340> the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֑י <WH2983> and the Jebusites וְהִכְחַדְתִּֽיו׃ <WH3582> and I will cut them off

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תִשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֤ה <WH7812> Thou shalt not bow down לֵאלֹֽהֵיהֶם֙ <WH430> to their gods וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תָֽעָבְדֵ֔ם <WH5647> nor serve וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> them nor do כְּמַֽעֲשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <WH4639> after their works כִּ֤י <WH3588> for הָרֵס֙ <WH2040> but thou shalt utterly תְּהָ֣רְסֵ֔ם <WH2040> overthrow וְשַׁבֵּ֥ר <WH7665> them and quite תְּשַׁבֵּ֖ר <WH7665> break down מַצֵּבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4676> their images

וַעֲבַדְתֶּ֗ם <WH5647> And ye shall serve אֵ֚ת <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God וּבֵרַ֥ךְ <WH1288> and he shall bless אֶֽת־ <WH853> לַחְמְךָ֖ <WH3899> thy bread וְאֶת־ <WH853> מֵימֶ֑יךָ <WH4325> and thy water וַהֲסִרֹתִ֥י <WH5493> away מַחֲלָ֖ה <WH4245> sickness מִקִּרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH7130> from the midst

לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall be no תִהְיֶ֛ה <WH1961> become מְשַׁכֵּלָ֥ה <WH7921> There shall nothing cast their young וַעֲקָרָ֖ה <WH6135> nor be barren בְּאַרְצֶ֑ךָ <WH776> in thy land אֶת־ <WH853> מִסְפַּ֥ר <WH4557> the number יָמֶ֖יךָ <WH3117> of thy days אֲמַלֵּֽא׃ <WH4390> I will fulfil

אֶת־ <WH853> אֵֽימָתִי֙ <WH367> my fear אֲשַׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> I will send לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before וְהַמֹּתִי֙ <WH2000> thee and will destroy אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> all the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom תָּבֹ֖א <WH935> to whom thou shalt come בָּהֶ֑ם וְנָתַתִּ֧י <WH5414> and I will make אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֹיְבֶ֛יךָ <WH341> all thine enemies אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> to עֹֽרֶף׃ <WH6203> turn their backs

וְשָׁלַחְתִּ֥י <WH7971> And I will send אֶת־ <WH853> הַצִּרְעָ֖ה <WH6880> hornets לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> before וְגֵרְשָׁ֗ה <WH1644> thee which shall drive out אֶת־ <WH853> הַחִוִּ֧י <WH2340> the Hivite אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֛י <WH3669> the Canaanite וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחִתִּ֖י <WH2850> and the Hittite מִלְּפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> from before

לֹ֧א <WH3808> I will not אֲגָרְשֶׁ֛נּוּ <WH1644> I will not drive them out מִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> from before בְּשָׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year אֶחָ֑ת <WH259> thee in one פֶּן־ <WH6435> may not תִּהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> become הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> lest the land שְׁמָמָ֔ה <WH8077> become desolate וְרַבָּ֥ה <WH7227> multiply עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> too חַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> and the beast הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> of the field

מְעַ֥ט <WH4592> By little מְעַ֛ט <WH4592> and little אֲגָרְשֶׁ֖נּוּ <WH1644> I will drive them out מִפָּנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> from before עַ֚ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> you תִּפְרֶ֔ה <WH6509> thee until thou be increased וְנָחַלְתָּ֖ <WH5157> and inherit אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the land

וְשַׁתִּ֣י <WH7896> And I will set אֶת־ <WH853> גְּבֻלְךָ֗ <WH1366> thy bounds מִיַּם־ <WH3220> sea סוּף֙ <WH5488> from the Red וְעַד־ <WH5704> against יָ֣ם <WH3220> even unto the sea פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וּמִמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> and from the desert עַד־ <WH5704> against הַנָּהָ֑ר <WH5104> unto the river כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> for I will deliver בְּיֶדְכֶ֗ם <WH3027> into your hand אֵ֚ת <WH853> יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> the inhabitants הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land וְגֵרַשְׁתָּ֖מוֹ <WH1644> and thou shalt drive them out מִפָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> before
לֹא־ <WH3808> no תִכְרֹ֥ת <WH3772> Thou shalt make לָהֶ֛ם וְלֵאלֹֽהֵיהֶ֖ם <WH430> with them nor with their gods בְּרִֽית׃ <WH1285> no covenant

לֹ֤א <WH3808> shall not יֵשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> They shall not dwell בְּאַרְצְךָ֔ <WH776> in thy land פֶּן־ <WH6435> because יַחֲטִ֥יאוּ <WH2398> lest they make thee sin אֹתְךָ֖ <WH853> לִ֑י כִּ֤י <WH3588> will surely תַעֲבֹד֙ <WH5647> against me for if thou serve אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> their gods כִּֽי־ <WH3588> will surely יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לְךָ֖ לְמוֹקֵֽשׁ׃ <WH4170> it will surely be a snare פ
